structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Department Of The Attorney General, And The District Attorneys

law.catch_line: Narcotic And Harmful Drugs; Training Program For Law Enforcement Officers

text.section: the laws of the commonwealth relating to the possession, sale, and manufacture of narcotic and harmful drugs;
the methods and procedures for detecting and ascertaining the identity of the various narcotic and harmful drugs;
law enforcement techniques, intelligence operations, and methods of promoting cooperation among the municipal, metropolitan, and state police departments;
search and seizure techniques in accordance with the Constitution of the United States and with the Constitution and laws of the commonwealth;
the physiological and psychological effects of the various narcotic and harmful drugs;
the underlying psychological and sociological causes of drug use and drug abuse;
opportunities for treatment and rehabilitation of drug dependent persons; and
educational programs relating to drugs sponsored by the department of education, other public agencies, and private organizations.
